recordType.name: EAP Process Detail
recordType.a:description: Contains record list view for Process

#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_linkField"( links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"( label: rf!euc_reference_number, recordType: rp!type, identifier: rp!id ) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Process Id", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "process_id", align: "RIGHT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!process_id, align: "RIGHT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Process Name", field: "process_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayValue: rf!process_name, align: null ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Sub Cluster Name", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "sub_cluster_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!sub_cluster_name ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Cluster Name", field: "cluster_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!cluster_name ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Region", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "region_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!region_name ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Country", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "country_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!country_name ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Calendar", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "calendar_name", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: rf!calendar_name ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Is Active", width: "DISTRIBUTE", align: "CENTER", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_imageField_v1"( images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconIndicator"( icon: if( contains( toboolean( rf!is_active ), true() ), "STATUS_OK", "STATUS_NOTDONE" ) ), caption: if( contains( toboolean( rf!is_active ), true() ), "Active", "In-Active" ) ), size: "ICON", isThumbnail: false, style: "STANDARD", align: "CENTER" ) ) }, pageSize: 50, defaultSort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( ascending: false ), shadeAlternateRows: true )

a:relatedActionCfg.a:staticDescriptionString: Click here to Initiate the process
